title: Real GDP is adjusted for price level

content.question: A countryâ€™s real gross domestic product is the annual value of all final goods and services that are

choices.label: purchased in that country, adjusted for changes in the price level
produced in that country, expressed in current prices
produced in that country, less exports
produced in that country, less depreciation
produced in that country, adjusted for changes in the price level

content.answer: produced in that country, adjusted for changes in the price level

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle
